name: jdhenry105
text: A very special Achewood.

name: waddlerz
text: The very first slant reference

name: arkher
text: Emphasis on "special.

name: centipede_damascus
text: It is a crime to spill all that fine whiskey.

name: hellofyellin
text: Todd's Acorn Whiskey is not fine whiskey.  It is what you pour on a wound before you pull the musket-ball out with a length of a deer's antler.

name: jlynes
text: That is hell of picturesque.  I salute you, sir.

name: ford
text: This comic just inspired me to line up the last two shots of my Saint Patty's bottle of Jameson.  And now, to bed.

name: bron
text: It has an acquired taste.

name: abe
text: To have your slant on is a virtue.

name: spinynorman
text:
To quote Klaus Kinski - "Never judge a man by his virtues. Virtues can be faked. Judge him only by his vices, for vices are his needs."

If you understand Todd needs to be on the slant 24/7 then you Understand Todd.

name: jonmw
text: That is extremely deep. I'll be changing my signature on at least one forum that I frequent.

name: ambala
text: Don't be awesome this holiday season.

name: jrpigman
text: Achewood does not condone the totally awesome crime of intoxicated driving.

name: f1shst1ck
text: A musical achewood

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by mystkmanat, cailetshadow, miaou, Darthemed)

name: jsb
text: It is clearly ridiculous to ask Todd if he has been drinking.  Of course he has been drinking.  You know how he feels about drinking, damn it!

name: sargasm
text: Lie Bot leaves almost immediately.  He has better things to do.

name: snowman
text: Ha, that's great!  I did not notice that until you pointed it out.  Changing to 5.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: He's obviously gone out to get awesome.  None of this public-service-announcement bullshit for him, nope.

name: spectre
text: Lessee, I got two kindsa boze left in the house, Achewood and acorn whiskey . . . what's your pleasure?

name: faedrus
text: perhaps you meant Achewater rather than Achewood?

name: godfatherofsouls
text: looks like Lyle's trying to flee that chorus line

name: cpnglxynchos
text: he's closeted. that's why he's a Hole man and why he rigged Philippe's cart's horn to HERE COMES A HUGE FAG

name: godfatherofsouls
text: Yeah, I think Lyle's been down enough roads of debauchery that pleasure's just pleasure regardless of what the thing jumpin yer junk looks like. It's admirable, that level of laid-backedness.

name: deusoma
text: I think that's the first full-body shot of Cornelius there. And it's hilarious.

name: jamb23
text: Those dressing gowns don't leave much room for a chorus-line kick.

name: ushiewhispaz
text: Todd should have been drinking Uncle Jemimah's Pure Mash Liquor . It's 99% alcohol and that's per volume.

name: qeramah
text: Because knowing is half the battle.

name: laserblade
text: Cornelius appears to be wearing a Technicolor dreamcoat in the last panel.

name: em2
text:
I see this:
[IMGS OFF]

name: foetus_punch
text: I have tried to sing this, and it never comes out well. I would like to know what tune Chris Onstad had in mind.

name: schleey
text: pfft!

name: chachibenji
text: I love how Mr. Bears dance just seems to be something of a slight lean.

name: biznart
text: Todd thinks it is rad to get a DUI.  He probably also thinks it is rad to change a family's life forever.

name: tekende
text: Drink and drive all you want next holiday season, though.

name: goro
text:
Guys, the message is quite clear.

Drinkin' is awesome!

name: zapatos
text: Happy New Year!

name: tom-ba
text: I love Todd's little intoxication bubbles.  They are sooo cute.

name: echidnaboy
text: "Well, he ain't really my buddy, but he has a TV. An' I wasn't really gonna trade it for my whiskey, I was gonna steal it. An' then I was gonna watch TV an' drink whiskey."
